original_text: What accord has Christ with Belial? Or what portion does a believer share with an unbeliever?
korean_text: 그리스도와 벨리알이 어찌 조화되며 믿는 자와 믿지 않는 자가 어찌 상관하며

sentences.original_text: What accord has Christ with Belial?
Or what portion does a believer share with an unbeliever?
sentences.korean_translation: 또 믿는 자가 믿지 않는 자와 무슨 몫을 나누겠습니까?
